english: 6 — Try parent_window.maxsize(x,x); to set the max
spanish: 6 - Prueba parent_window.maxsize(x,x); para establecer el max

english:
def show_strings(strings):
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title("Strings")

    label1 = tk.Label(root, text=strings[0])
    label1.pack()
    label2 = tk.Label(root, text=strings[1])
    label2.pack()

    root.mainloop()
spanish:
def mostrar_cadenas(cadenas):
    root = tk.Tk()
    root.title("Cadenas")

    label1 = tk.Label(root, text=cadenas[0])
    label1.pack()
    label2 = tk.Label(root, text=cadenas[1])
    label2.pack()

    root.mainloop()

english: How do I get a Tkinter application to jump to the front? Currently, the window appears behind all my other windows and doesn't get focus.
spanish: ¿Cómo consigo que una aplicación Tkinter salte al frente? Actualmente, la ventana aparece detrás de todas mis otras ventanas y no obtiene el foco.
